General.Name: Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited
General.Description: Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, imports, and distributes raw materials, ingredients, food chemicals, and consumer products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Industrial Food Products; Consumer Food Products; and Manufacture of Skincare Products, Cosmetics, Food Supplements and Medicines Used to Treat Skin Diseases. It offers cocoa butter, liquor, and powder; couverture and compound chocolate; chocolate chips, spreads, and fillings; raisins, cranberries, cashew nuts, almonds, and rolled oats; egg powder; popcorns, cooking papers, and pumpkin powder; margarine and shortening; seasoning products; icing, ground, and donut sugar; glazing powder, maltodextrin, dextrose, aspatame, acesulfame K, and sucralose; potato, modified, wheat, and corn starch; wheat flour and gluten; potato granules; whipping creams; and bread improvers, yeasts, and baking powders. It also provides carboxy methyl cellulose, carrageenan, gellan gum, pectin, and xanthan gum; potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, and phosphate preservatives; powder drink; baking ingredients; and batter and pancake mix, and creamy custard powder. In addition, the company offers frozen and chilled products, comprising of fruits and vegetables, French fries, meat and seafood, cheese, and frozen bakery products; and hemp/cannabis and CBD products, as well as  imports and distributes consumer food products, such as microwave popcorn, granular bars, seasoned laver, pasta, olive oil, fruit jams, tea, juices, snacks, sauces, syrups, semi-processed raw materials and frozen products, gourmet foods and bakeries, and beverages and drinks under the brands Bel Normande, Clos Pons, Campagna, Castella, EL Avion, Golden Pot, Gemez Suki, Harvey Fresh, Ital Lemon, Kimnori, etc. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1.Name: Ms. Kanollas  Wongisariyakul
1.Title: MD, CFO, Acting Company Sec., Acting VP of Bus. Devel. & Director
